pages.text: $(#800080)Kevin$() is a... strange material. Found in both normal and deep caves, his properties can be used to help with multiple different situations.
He has offensive, defensive and restorative properties. This makes him a rather helpful material. He can be used to craft many an item.
His main use is for duplicating Goober Upgrade Templates, but you can also use him to craft some weapons, like the Life Saber.
